HomePage.title: Play
HomePage.empty-scramble: Choose a cube to load a scramble.
HomePage.new_worst_time: Oops, you got your worst time!
HomePage.personal_best: You have beaten your previous personal best.

SolvesPage.title: Solves

dialogs.move-to-history-para: You will be able to access them by tapping the history switch.

toast.success-copy-description: Has been copied to your clipboard.

alert.title: Attention!
alert.empty-cubes: No cube selected. Please choose one.

SolvesPage.empty-solves-description: Tap the switch at the top of the screen to see your history.

Cubes-modal.delete-collection-description: This cube collection will be deleted, along with all of its solves, records, and settings.
Cubes-modal.danger-msg: Modifying the collection category also changes the solves associated with that category.
Cubes-modal.name: Name
Cubes-modal.new-collection-description: Cube collections allow you to keep track of each cube's history without affecting overall category stats.

Settings-menu.allowed-file-types: Only image files (JPEG, PNG, GIF) are allowed.
Settings-menu.legend: NexusTimer is an unopinionated, minimalist and open source web tool for SpeedCubing.

backup-modal.title: Intelligent Backup Restoration
backup-modal.description: Let NexusTimer smartly import everything; it will automatically detect and recreate a compatible data structure.
backup-modal.alert-category: CSTimer and CubeDesk require manual adjustment of categories.
backup-modal.drag-drop: Drag and drop your files here, or click to select.
backup-modal.loading-part-1: This action takes less than a minute.
backup-modal.loading-part-2: Please wait, don't close this window.

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.fetching-last-backup: Fetching information from server wait a moment...
SettingsPage.unlink-account-para1: Are you sure you want to unlink from the account
SettingsPage.unlink-account-para2: Unlinking will delete all data from this device.
SettingsPage.save-data-description: Do you want save your account data on the cloud?
SettingsPage.save-data-warning: This will overwrite previously saved data.
SettingsPage.load-data-description: Do you want to download your account data from the cloud?
SettingsPage.load-data-warning: This will merge current data with saved data.

Metadata.title: Nexus Timer - Professional Rubik's Cube Timer
Metadata.description: Nexus Timer is a professional platform for training and analyzing your journey with the Rubik's Cube.
